title: Edge AI & Local Inference
text:
1. Green-AI Cognitive Pipeline
Local LLM (Mistral) Neo4j LangGraph Energy-Aware
The “Flagship” Local Agent. This system replaces cloud APIs with a quantized local model to reduce carbon footprint and ensure data privacy.

Key Innovation: A “Real-Time Energy Router” that measures the exact Joules per token.
Architecture: ReAct Agent switching between Graph (Structured) and Vector (Unstructured) memory.


System ArchitectureLive Demo (GIF)









View Code on GitHub



2. Eco Sentry: Cognitive Edge Security
TinyLlama-1.1B ChromaDB Docker
A “Cognitive Firewall” running on the Edge Node.

Problem: Traditional firewalls are rigid; Cloud SIEM is slow/expensive.
Solution: A local Vector Database (ChromaDB) learns traffic patterns. Anomalies trigger a local TinyLlama agent to explain why the packet is dangerous.


System ArchitectureLive Demo (GIF)









View Code on GitHub



3. Civic Pulse Monitor (Smart City Ops)
Ollama (Llama 3) Neo4j PyDeck
A privacy-first Smart City architecture running entirely offline.

Problem: Traditional systems treat civic reports as context-blind rows.
Solution: Federates structured logs with unstructured geospatial data, utilizing local Llama 3 inference and graph logic to autonomously identify high-priority hazards.


Live Demo (GIF)






View Code on GitHub



4. Aegis Overwatch (Efficiency Route)
Ollama (LLaVA) OpenCV Neo4j
A decentralized drone safety pipeline.

Workflow: “See-Think-Act” loop.
Tech: Uses Ollama (LLaVA) for vision and Neo4j for protocol enforcement, entirely offline.


System ArchitectureLive Demo (GIF)









View Code on GitHub

title: Data Engineering & Cognitive BI

title: Data Engineering & Cognitive BI
text:
3. EuroAgri Pipeline
Neo4j Pandas ETL
An open-source data backbone for precision agriculture that processes high-resolution NetCDF climate data and NUTS2 administrative boundaries to generate granular crop-variety recommendations.
Engineering Accomplishments:

Key Innovation: Implemented a transparent Heuristic Imputation Engine (NPK v01) to estimate critical Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium levels from soil texture and organic matter, bypassing the lack of direct NPK data in global datasets.
Architecture: Transforms tabular “Source of Truth” Parquet files into a Neo4j Knowledge Graph, enabling complex semantic queries like identifying high-risk disease zones across NUTS2 regional boundaries.
Resource Optimization: Integrated the FAO-56 Penman-Monteith equation to calculate precise Net Irrigation Needs by comparing weekly soil water storage against effective rainfall.


View Code on GitHub

title: Data Engineering & Cognitive BI
text:
4. Net-Load Forecasting (Master’s Dissertation)
Bayesian LSTM Uncertainty Quantification

Research: Investigated the intersection of probabilistic deep learning and out-of-distribution detection to solve the “context blindness” of traditional energy forecasting during rapid Atlantic weather shifts.
Model: A modular stack using walk-forward cross-validation to compare DeepSVDD and One-Class SVM detectors against a Bayesian baseline, achieving reliability through strict temporal integrity and residual-based alerting.


View Project on GitHub Download Dissertation (PDF)

title: Cloud-Native & Hybrid Systems
text:
Certifications


 AWS Solutions Architect


 Google Core Infrastructure





1. Eco Sentry: Cloud Hybrid Route
Google Gemini API Neo4j Streamlit Async
The “Satellite Command” unit.

Hybrid Logic: Uses Google Gemini (Infinite Context) for vision but restricts decisions using a deterministic Neo4j Graph.
Engineering: Implements an asynchronous “Pulse” architecture to handle API rate limits without freezing the video feed.


System ArchitectureLive Demo (GIF)









View Code on GitHub



2. Carbon-Aware Agentic Scheduler
AWS Lambda LangGraph Multi-Agent
A system that schedules AI training jobs based on the carbon intensity of the electricity grid.

View Code on GitHub

Sub-100ms defect detection for manufacturing using AWS IoT Core.
